org.prolobjectlink.db

Interface DatabaseConsole

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatabaseConsole

    public interface DatabaseConsole
    Represent the database system console.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jose Zalacain

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,String> getArguments(String[] args)
      Create a arguments map from a given string arguments array.
      int getDefaultHttpPort()
      Return an integer that represent the default port for http web server control embedded in the platform.
      ModelGenerator getModelGeneratorInstance()
      Create an instance of the model generator for the current platform.
      WebServerControl getWebServerControl(int port)
      Return an instance of the http web server control embedded in the platform.
      void printUsage()
      Used to print console usage.
      void run(String[] args)
      Command line interface program run method for this platform.

    • Method Detail

      • getModelGeneratorInstance

        ModelGenerator getModelGeneratorInstance()
        Create an instance of the model generator for the current platform.
        Returns:
        an instance of the model generator
        Since:
        1.0

      • getDefaultHttpPort

        int getDefaultHttpPort()
        Return an integer that represent the default port for http web server control embedded in the platform.
        Returns:
        default http port for web server listening
        Since:
        1.0

      • getWebServerControl

        WebServerControl getWebServerControl(int port)
        Return an instance of the http web server control embedded in the platform. The server control is showed in host system try after run invocation and from there the server can be started.
        Parameters:
        port - port to web server listening
        Returns:
        an instance of the web server control
        Since:
        1.0

      • getArguments

        Map<String,String> getArguments(String[] args)
        Create a arguments map from a given string arguments array. Used for convert command line interface program arguments array to argument map.
        Parameters:
        args - string arguments array
        Returns:
        arguments map
        Since:
        1.0

      • run

        void run(String[] args)

        Command line interface program run method for this platform. Take the program arguments from main entry point and execute the job. Used like:

        public class Main{ public static void main(String[] args) { new Main().run(args); } }
        Parameters:
        args - command line interface program arguments array
        Since:
        1.0

      • printUsage

        void printUsage()
        Used to print console usage.
        Since:
        1.0
